item.title: 35 Chinese PLA soldiers return to Chumar sit on a hillock
item.description: Official sources said about 35 PLA men returned to Chumar in northeast Ladakh and were perched on a hillock claiming the area to be part of China while another 300 soldiers were maintaining presence close to Line of Actual Control
item.itunes:subtitle: Official sources said about 35 PLA men returned to Chumar in northeast Ladakh and were perched on a hillock claiming the area to be part of China while another 300 soldiers were maintaining presence close to Line of Actual Control
item.itunes:summary: Official sources said about 35 PLA men returned to Chumar in northeast Ladakh and were perched on a hillock claiming the area to be part of China while another 300 soldiers were maintaining presence close to Line of Actual Control

item.title: UP prepares plans to tackle love jihad
item.description: Uttar Pradeshs home department is drawing up a strategy to deal with cases of socalled love jihad a highly emotive issue that officials say is turning out to be a major law and order problem in various districts
item.itunes:subtitle: Uttar Pradeshs home department is drawing up a strategy to deal with cases of socalled love jihad a highly emotive issue that officials say is turning out to be a major law and order problem in various districts
item.itunes:summary: Uttar Pradeshs home department is drawing up a strategy to deal with cases of socalled love jihad a highly emotive issue that officials say is turning out to be a major law and order problem in various districts

item.title: CBI probing Chidambaram role in AircelMaxis deal
item.description: The CBI is probing the role of then finance minister P Chidambaram in allowing foreign investment by a Mauritiusbased company according to its charge sheet in the AircelMaxis deal
item.itunes:subtitle: The CBI is probing the role of then finance minister P Chidambaram in allowing foreign investment by a Mauritiusbased company according to its charge sheet in the AircelMaxis deal
item.itunes:summary: The CBI is probing the role of then finance minister P Chidambaram in allowing foreign investment by a Mauritiusbased company according to its charge sheet in the AircelMaxis deal

item.title: India to play hardball at UN climate summit
item.description: India will play hardball at the United Nations climate summit in New York next week asking rich nations to deliver on their promise to capitalise Green Climate Fund to buy copy rights of clean technologies and have a new climate treaty on the cardinal principles enshrined in Kyoto Protocol and Rio plus 20 outcome document
item.itunes:subtitle: India will play hardball at the United Nations climate summit in New York next week asking rich nations to deliver on their promise to capitalise Green Climate Fund to buy copy rights of clean technologies and have a new climate treaty on the cardinal pri
item.itunes:summary: India will play hardball at the United Nations climate summit in New York next week asking rich nations to deliver on their promise to capitalise Green Climate Fund to buy copy rights of clean technologies and have a new climate treaty on the cardinal principles enshrined in Kyoto Protocol and Rio plus 20 outcome document

item.title: Good at putting people at ease
item.description: Richard Rahul Verma had reportedly declined the US ambassadorship to India the first time he was sounded out by the Barack Obama administration After many years in the State Department and the US Congress he had recently joined the lobby group Albright Stonebridge a common career shift among Washingtonians who need to earn the dollars that cannot be earned in a government job
item.itunes:subtitle: Richard Rahul Verma had reportedly declined the US ambassadorship to India the first time he was sounded out by the Barack Obama administration After many years in the State Department and the US Congress he had recently joined the lobby group Albright St
item.itunes:summary: Richard Rahul Verma had reportedly declined the US ambassadorship to India the first time he was sounded out by the Barack Obama administration After many years in the State Department and the US Congress he had recently joined the lobby group Albright Stonebridge a common career shift among Washingtonians who need to earn the dollars that cannot be earned in a government job

item.title: SC to CBI Dont file coal scam closure reports
item.description: The Supreme Court Friday asked the Centre for its stand on NGO Common Causes application to remove CBI director Ranjit Sinha from supervising the coal scam probe while restraining the agency from filing charge sheets or closure reports in the case until the plea wasnt decided

item.title: Direct benefit transfer plan set for expansion
item.description: To check rising public expenditure the governments two biggest moneyspender schemes subsidised ration for poor and job guarantee in rural areas will soon be on the Aadhaarenabled Direct Benefit Transfer platform

item.title: Bangladesh rakes up Saradha money with India
item.description: Bangladesh foreign minister AH Mahmood Ali learnt to have taken up issue of Saradha scam money making its way to fund to JamaateIslami in the neighbouring country during his meeting with national security adviser Ajit Doval on Friday
item.itunes:subtitle: Bangladesh foreign minister AH Mahmood Ali learnt to have taken up issue of Saradha scam money making its way to fund to JamaateIslami in the neighbouring country during his meeting with national security adviser Ajit Doval on Friday
item.itunes:summary: Bangladesh foreign minister AH Mahmood Ali learnt to have taken up issue of Saradha scam money making its way to fund to JamaateIslami in the neighbouring country during his meeting with national security adviser Ajit Doval on Friday

item.title: Poor monsoon pushes food output to 5yearlow
item.description: Indias summer foodgrain output may to fall 7 a fiveyear low after a patchy start to this years JuneSeptember monsoon period as per the governments first of the four annual projections
item.itunes:subtitle: Indias summer foodgrain output may to fall 7 a fiveyear low after a patchy start to this years JuneSeptember monsoon period as per the governments first of the four annual projections
item.itunes:summary: Indias summer foodgrain output may to fall 7 a fiveyear low after a patchy start to this years JuneSeptember monsoon period as per the governments first of the four annual projections

item.title: Govt changes rules of land acquisition to give a legup to industry
item.description: Clearing the decks for land acquisition under the UPAenacted land acquisition law the NDA government has notified the rules for its implementation
item.itunes:subtitle: Clearing the decks for land acquisition under the UPAenacted land acquisition law the NDA government has notified the rules for its implementation
item.itunes:summary: Clearing the decks for land acquisition under the UPAenacted land acquisition law the NDA government has notified the rules for its implementation

item.title: At Chumar a retreat of sorts
item.description: The staring match between Indian and Chinese troops at Chumar in eastern Ladakh continued on Friday amid evidence that the Chinese were retreating Indian troops however have decided to adopt an aggressive stance and stay put at their positions in the sector
item.itunes:subtitle: The staring match between Indian and Chinese troops at Chumar in eastern Ladakh continued on Friday amid evidence that the Chinese were retreating Indian troops however have decided to adopt an aggressive stance and stay put at their positions in the sect
item.itunes:summary: The staring match between Indian and Chinese troops at Chumar in eastern Ladakh continued on Friday amid evidence that the Chinese were retreating Indian troops however have decided to adopt an aggressive stance and stay put at their positions in the sector

item.title: Over 90 guests barring finance home ministers at Pranabs banquet
item.description: President Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan were hosted by President Pranab Mukherjee on Thursday night along with a large number of VVIPs
item.itunes:subtitle: President Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan were hosted by President Pranab Mukherjee on Thursday night along with a large number of VVIPs
item.itunes:summary: President Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan were hosted by President Pranab Mukherjee on Thursday night along with a large number of VVIPs

item.title: Minority rights watchdog for action on BJP MPs
item.description: The National Commission for Minorities has sought a probe into the vitriolic remarks by BJP leaders against the countrys Muslims which violate the spirit of the Constitution
item.itunes:subtitle: The National Commission for Minorities has sought a probe into the vitriolic remarks by BJP leaders against the countrys Muslims which violate the spirit of the Constitution
item.itunes:summary: The National Commission for Minorities has sought a probe into the vitriolic remarks by BJP leaders against the countrys Muslims which violate the spirit of the Constitution

item.title: Acid attack survivors to run cafe in Taj city
item.description: To be run by acid attack survivors and christened as Caf Sheroes Hangout the outlet is being supported by the organisation Stop Acid Attack which hopes to launch the cafe in the first week of October before taking the concept to Delhi
item.itunes:subtitle: To be run by acid attack survivors and christened as Caf Sheroes Hangout the outlet is being supported by the organisation Stop Acid Attack which hopes to launch the cafe in the first week of October before taking the concept to Delhi
item.itunes:summary: To be run by acid attack survivors and christened as Caf Sheroes Hangout the outlet is being supported by the organisation Stop Acid Attack which hopes to launch the cafe in the first week of October before taking the concept to Delhi

item.title: Telangana for aligning resources in favour of states
item.description: Telangana on Friday pitched for 40 devolution of the central tax revenue to states making a case for allocation of resources based on the functional responsibilities of the Centre and the states under the Constitution
item.itunes:subtitle: Telangana on Friday pitched for 40 devolution of the central tax revenue to states making a case for allocation of resources based on the functional responsibilities of the Centre and the states under the Constitution
item.itunes:summary: Telangana on Friday pitched for 40 devolution of the central tax revenue to states making a case for allocation of resources based on the functional responsibilities of the Centre and the states under the Constitution
